title: Cool Guy - Style App for Men
creator: DDN Media Inc.

extendedInfo.description: Cool Guy is your ultimate style planner and shopping assistant - revolving around the clothes in your closet and the clothes you want. ** Cool Guy and Stylish Girl were presented by Apple on the New York Fashion Week and were showcased throughout the world in Appleâs There is an App for That TV commercial.Also Featured in:InStyleMen's Health UKSeventeenNY DailyNBCFox NewsThe TimesFinancial TimesSan Francisco ChronicleTelegraph UKIndependentThe Huffington PostAnd many Fashion blogsDownload now and see why more than 2 Million Users downloaded Stylish Girl and Cool Guy.**Fashion is not about the gear you wear - it's how you put it together. Mix and match your clothes with the Cool Guy's FUN & EASY interface and step up your style. - CREATE THE LOOK YOU WANT anytime and anywhere;  Your wardrobe digitalized!- RE-DISCOVER WHAT IS IN YOUR CLOSET and stop wearing the same clothes/outfits over and over again;- SHOP ONLINE. Browse Shopstyle.com, mix and match the online items against your clothes and outfits;- PACK FOR YOUR TRAVEL with no hassle;- SHARE YOUR OUTFITS AND CLOTHES with your friends and let them be your fashion consultants;This version brings you more style inspiration and tips from our stylist Patricia, only for you guys.

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Very cool app. And very helpful, lots of different clothing to choose from.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: . I like it it\'s a cool app it works pretty good there\'s a lot of ideas you and different possibilities of putting together an outfit that you can enjoy the benefits of really having this app
reviews.author: Lundon Stylez

reviews.title: NICE :-)
reviews.comment: LOVE THIS APP!!!! LOVE THE WAY IT SHOPS FOR LESS EXPENSIVE CLOTHES AS WELL.. GREAT APP TO HAVE IF NEED NEW IDEAS!! :-) IF YOU DONT HAVE THE VERSACE $$??!! That\'s OK just hit the find something similar button and compare at a cheaper cost.. LUV IT ;-)
reviews.author: Brian Wilson

reviews.title: Nice site but...
reviews.comment: If I could figure out how to use the filter when looking up items it would be five stars.
reviews.author: David Sabian

reviews.title: STYLISH MEN
reviews.comment: ITS PERFECT FOR US STYLISH MEN THAT ARE BUSY AND NEED TO KNOW WHAT WE CAN WEAR A WEEK IN ADVANCE
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice shot
reviews.comment: Pretty easy to use and plenty of good dressing styles. 8/10
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great idea and fashion app reminds you what u have
reviews.comment: Great app helps inventory what u have and set up different outfits. Love the closet only wish u could put your own wishlist on there too. Overall. Love the app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: been looking for an app like this!
reviews.comment: great app! improvement could be to include option to put notes / events on calendar so you can remember what you wore to where. just my 2 cents.
reviews.author: NeiL Eusebio

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: Terrible app. Just black screens and crashes. Useless.
reviews.author: Mark DelRosario

reviews.title: Great app, but . . .
reviews.comment: This is such an awesome app, especially the shopping mall.  However, I\'m a little embarrassed to share it with anyone because it has on of the WORST, GENERIC NAMES IN THE HISTORY OF APPS.  Wonderful app, just needs a new name
reviews.author: Andrew Allen

reviews.title: Style for miles
reviews.comment: There is so much material to chose from. It makes updating your wardrobe easy and fun.  Only a few bugs to fix. Also there\'s not a lot, but some women\'s items that made it into there.  It sometimes crashes, but no more than any other app out there. Overall I enjoy it very much.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Must have.
reviews.comment: Excellent tool for any trend-concious man who has already too much stuff in the wardrobe but still needs more...:)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Manny
reviews.comment: This is a really good way of having varieties of fashion styles and an idea of something to wear all the time. great I like it .
reviews.author: Manny Appiah - Danquah

reviews.title: excellent
reviews.comment: the program is what you expect it to be just a few tweaks then it\'ll be unbeatable
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dennis
reviews.comment: This app is awesome i create different types of outfits and then i go to the mall nd try to recreate the outfit I made. Everyone compliments me dressing style. This is the app I\'ve been looking for. Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Important
reviews.comment: Very important for a man to have some type of style. Finally an app. that provides more than just an narrow opinion on men\'s fashion. This is a must have! App gives you up to date style, online deals, must haves, & tips.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don Nazar
reviews.comment: Very awesome app. A must have. Helped alot to increase my style knowledge
reviews.author: Don Nazar

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Its an Awsome apps. for mens...
reviews.author: hiten shah

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Would be even better if you could \"cut\" the clothing off of the pictures. A few bugs but definitely worth it. Developer is definitely awesome!!
reviews.author: Josh Gonzales

reviews.title: Could be more flexible
reviews.comment: Nice touch with the store, but nothing I like.
reviews.author: A Google User
